2c245ffb-466f-4f39-a459-453ee85934d8:
You call forth a surge of holy power, which grants you the following benefits: a +2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, a +4 sacred bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, resistance 5 to acid and fire, a +5 sacred bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (when used to intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made against evil creatures, a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} checks, and fast {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} 2. Any {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} threat {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} made against an evil creature with a weapon you wield is automatically confirmed.
Nongood {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasters{/g} can cast this spell, but doing so causes them to be sickened (for spellcasters who are neither good nor evil) or staggered (for spellcasters who are evil) for the spell's duration.
2523b7c2-a10e-4923-8a46-beb04aebd9d0:
You call up unholy power to smite your enemies. The power takes the form of a cold, cloying miasma of greasy darkness. Only good and neutral (not evil) creatures are harmed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
The spell deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two caster levels (maximum 5d8) to a good creature (or 1d6 per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, maximum 10d6, to a good outsider) and causes it to be sickened for 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} reduces damage to half and negates the sickened effect. The effects cannot be negated by remove disease or {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g}, but remove curse is effective.
The spell deals only half damage to creatures who are neither evil nor good, and they are not sickened. Such a creature can reduce the damage by half again (down to one-quarter) with a successful Will save.
d90b63e7-035a-4ed7-a882-c675d93ce636: You call upon the powers of unlife to render the subject blinded.
00b2e535-b4ea-47d4-b919-9f384c9ccb93: You call upon the primordial power of ancient megafauna to boost the {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} of your target. Because of its connection to living creatures of the distant past, the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} does not function on outsiders, undead, and summoned creatures. Your target grows to legendary proportions, increasing in size by two categories. The creature's height doubles and its weight increases by a factor of 12. The target gains a +6 size {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} score and a +4 size bonus to its {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score. It gains a +6 form bonus to its natural armor, and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/adamantine. Melee and ranged weapons used by this creature deal more {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
218b487e-ba1f-4190-84d0-4bfcabcb902e: You can attempt to slay any one living creature. When you cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, your hand seethes with eerie dark fire. You must succeed on a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to touch the target. The target takes ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}12d6{/g} + 1 per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} succeeds, it instead takes (3d6 + 1 point per caster level) points of damage. The subject might die from damage even if it succeeds at its saving throw.
53a41cf2-9895-4568-9554-19fdca23ee9f: You can evoke a dazzling beam of intense light each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Each creature in the beam is blinded (permanently) and takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} negates the blindness and reduces the damage by half. An undead creature caught within the beam takes 1d6 points of damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 20d6), or half damage with a successful Reflex save.
ff95f947-7693-4534-914b-faac40141c7a: You can make a trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. This trip {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
9955e3b2-5df8-4f07-bd59-3445b94ffce0: You can make any humanoid creature fight on your side as if it was your ally. It will {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability. However this creature will try to throw off the domination, making a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
1ab833c0-a6fc-42d2-ba55-84d79701da0c: You can make any undead creature fight on your side as if it was your ally. It will {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability. However intelligent creatures will try to throw off the domination, making a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
27d21fd7-4ec1-4504-94bf-66010a5b20bb: You can perceive the world by creating high-pitched noises and listening to their echoes. This gives you blindsight to a range of 50 feet.
a25c8bfb-ad4e-4f86-b047-61606309f4c7: You can see any objects or beings that are invisible within your range of vision.
288fe54a-0e12-4c5f-aa3a-932e78eb567d:
You can throw a flask of alchemist's fire as a splash weapon with a range increment of 10 feet.
A direct hit deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}. Every creature within 5 feet of the point where the flask hits takes 1 point of fire {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from the splash.
a2573421-1256-4211-a225-1d89bf3ba581:
You can use dispel magic to end one area effect from a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} in the selected point.
You make one dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d20{/g} + your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) and compare that to the spell with highest caster level ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 11 + the spell's caster level). If successful, that spell ends. If not, compare the same result to the spell with the next highest caster level. Repeat this process until you have dispelled one area effect in the selected point, or you have failed to dispel every area effect.
1f6aa2a5-5151-4601-85a0-030a6ca4f5d1: You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that has been cast on a creature or one area effect from a spell in the selected point.
5c57b422-f70c-4db0-92c1-1684b2a41471:
You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that has been cast on a creature.
You make one dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d20{/g} + your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) and compare that to the spell with highest caster level ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 11 + the spell's caster level). If successful, that spell ends. If not, compare the same result to the spell with the next highest caster level. Repeat this process until you have dispelled one spell affecting the target, or you have failed to dispel every spell.
0616a16b-32bd-49a6-856c-ded2eeb60658:
You can {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} a creature, harm an undead creature, or call upon a very recently dead creature to fight beyond {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}'s reach. The target creature regains {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum 10d8).
This healing can even bring back to life party members that have died within 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. If you cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} at a creature whose hit point total is at a negative amount less than its {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score, it comes back to life and stabilizes at its new hit point total. If you awaken a dead creature in this way, all allies within 60 feet who can see it regain consciousness gain a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} for 1 minute thereafter, as the healing powers of your deity have imbued them with renewed vigor.
Creatures killed by death effects cannot be revived this way. This spell deals damage to undead creatures rather than curing them, and it cannot bring them back to life.
30c2295a-8159-4d30-a355-5eac7b2c63c6: You can't resist the lure of ancient treasures. But is it a wise choice?
5b567989-f127-4dae-81b4-032681c06910: You can't use your breath weapon right now.
fbd233cd-6c3b-4067-aa47-b3c9c270783c: You cause a single opponent to become profoundly stricken with intense grief. They can attempt a new {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s effect.
fe620403-5b61-4d77-9e8d-2fbd58c4c22f: You cause a spark of electricity to strike the target with a successful ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}.
e3d7f74a-9f75-4ecf-a130-c111285e8293: You challenge an evil creature to bring the fight to you, or suffer the consequences. You gain a +2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} against the subject of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} if the target has not made at least one {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} on you, it becomes sickened. If you move away from the target, the spell ends.
26a46a95-6dce-4c45-9b01-4c56ea2f9c5f:
You change the subject into a dog. It can't {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} scores drop to 1, and it loses any ability it had to cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} or use {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g}. Its movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 10 feet though.
Any polymorph effects on the target are automatically dispelled when a target fails to resist the effects of baleful polymorph, and as long as baleful polymorph remains in effect, the target cannot use other polymorph spells or effects to assume a new form. Baleful polymorph is a curse effect. {g|Encyclopedia:Incorporeal_Touch_Attack}Incorporeal{/g} creatures are immune to baleful polymorph.
0db8a765-8bd4-430a-899d-17da9eaac222:
You channel lawful power to smite enemies. The power takes the form of a three-dimensional grid of energy. Only chaotic and neutral (not lawful) creatures are harmed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
The spell deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two caster levels (maximum 5d8) to chaotic creatures (or 1d6 points of damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, maximum 10d6, to chaotic outsiders) and causes them to be dazed for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} reduces the damage to half and negates the daze effect.
The spell deals only half damage to creatures who are neither chaotic nor lawful, and they are not dazed. They can reduce the damage in half again (down to one-quarter of the roll) with a successful Will save.
7b5435a9-c8ce-415c-bc61-cc25bafcbe42:
You channel negative energy through your {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g}, fatiguing the target. You must succeed on a touch {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} to strike a target. The subject is immediately fatigued for the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s duration.
This spell has no effect on a creature that is already fatigued. Unlike with normal fatigue, the effect ends as soon as the spell's duration expires.
b7c70440-2e25-4f4e-8917-d2a3ac8bf4b7: You channel positive energy to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +25) on each creature in the radius. Like other cure {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, mass cure light wounds deals damage to undead in its area rather than curing them. An undead creature can apply {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, and can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to take half damage.
40de11c2-6e65-464a-ba8a-a2475b1b11cf: You channel positive energy to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +30) on each creature in the radius. Like other cure {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, mass cure moderate wounds deals damage to undead in its area rather than curing them. An undead creature can apply {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, and can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to take half damage.
9c8a8f72-e66f-40a9-839a-c67fa952edc4: You channel positive energy to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +35) on each creature in radius. Like other cure {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, mass cure serious wounds deals damage to undead in its area rather than curing them. An undead creature can apply {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, and can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to take half damage.
a684b7bd-64b8-4d1b-8f9d-222363d01e39: You channel positive energy to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +40) on each creature in the radius. Like other cure {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, mass cure {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} wounds deals damage to undead in its area rather than curing them. An undead creature can apply {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, and can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to take half damage.
a259430d-6305-4223-816b-cca47b8a1d4e: You channel the power of good and law into the target, temporarily giving it powers similar to those of a paladin. The target gains immunity to diseases and immunity to fear. It adds its {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} has no effect if cast on a paladin. Target has to be lawful good.
89c06878-7df0-4a0d-8e50-76d3489f8a98: You coat the targets in thick, sticky mud. The mud acts as a slow {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} and also makes targets dazed for one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as they clean their eyes. A haste effect cast on a creature slowed by the mud allows it to act normally for the duration of the haste right after it cleans its eyes. Slow does not stack with the effects of slowing mud. This spell cannot dispel haste.
0a7c4cdc-d8ee-4520-b15d-7f578a99c430: You compel the target to beg for forgiveness. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g}, the target cowers in fear. On a successful will save, it is shaken for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Each round after, a cowering subject may attempt a new save to end the effect.
bde0efa3-7640-45e9-ac6e-504ca3c031da: You confer on the subject the ability to see all things as they actually are. The subject sees the exact locations of creatures or objects under blur or displacement effects, sees invisible creatures normally.
009f7ed0-8602-4c9c-b044-adcceb41e0fb: You conjure a ball of packed ice and snow that you can throw at a single target as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. 52a5ac13-869d-4dfb-bf0a-21239d74805d: You conjure a pillar of positive energy in a single 5-foot square within range that radiates light as if it were a sunrod. f7373ac5-40cc-43c0-90af-5f69718531ac: You create a magical emanation that interferes with all illusions within it, giving creatures a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} to recognize them as illusions. You create a magical trap in the area that causes deadly stalactites or stalagmites to "bite" an intruder. The magical trap is triggered whenever an enemy creature moves through the affected area. The effect of cave fangs depends on whether you create stalactites or stalagmites (see below). You can place these traps anywhere within close range as {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}; the trap's radius is 5 feet. Each time you place a trap, the spell's duration is reduced by 10 minutes.
Stalactites: Shards of rock drop from above, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g} and piercing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (Reflex half). A creature that fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} is pinned to the ground under stalactites and rubble, gaining the entangled condition until it can free itself with a successful {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 15 {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} or DC 20 {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g}.
Stalagmites: Piercing spires of rock erupt up from the ground, dealing 3d8 points of piercing damage and knocking the creature prone (a successful Reflex saving throw halves this damage and avoids being knocked prone). Once the stalagmites appear, they function thereafter as spike stones for 1 minute per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and then crumble to dust.
d39d785c-bca1-48d1-b71d-16ca7025b1cc:
You create a massive wave of water that then moves in a straight line across land at a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} of 50 feet per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Creatures struck by a tsunami take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}24d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} (a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}).
In addition, every creature must succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics check{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g} against the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or be knocked prone and carried along by the wave.
Freedom of movement prevents a creature from being carried along by a tsunami but does not prevent damage caused by it hitting a creature.
e587586c-ae15-4375-b813-620a04aa1845: You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the subject simply by forming the fears of the subject's subconscious mind into something that its conscious mind can visualize: this most horrible beast. The target first gets a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to recognize the image as unreal. If that save fails, the phantasm touches the subject, and the subject must succeed at a Fortitude save or die from fear. Even if the Fortitude save is successful, the subject takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.

13b372a3-8b02-421f-b80f-6df6a35f84de: You create an area of {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} mud. The mud functions as difficult terrain. When a creature enters the mud, it is healed of {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}. A creature can be healed of ability {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} this way only once per day. Also, each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} after, the mud restores 1 hit point to the creature; this healing is unaffected by effects that increase a creature's healing.
35dc4761-adc8-48eb-90bf-8cd54ae4cde5:
You create an extradimensional hole with a depth of 10 feet per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum 100 feet). At the bottom of the pit is a pool of acid.
Any large or smaller creature standing in the area where you first conjured the pit must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} to jump to safety in the nearest open space. In addition, the edges of the pit are sloped, and any creature ending its turn on a square adjacent to the pit must make a Reflex saving throw with a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to avoid falling into it. Creatures subjected to an effect intended to push them into the pit (such as bull rush) do not get a saving throw to avoid falling in if they are affected by the pushing effect.
Creatures who fall into the pit take falling {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} as normal ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per 10 feet), plus 2d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} spent in the pit. The walls of the pit are quite slippery: to climb them, a creature needs a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of 30. When the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} ends, creatures within the hole rise up with the bottom of the pit until they are standing on the surface over the course of a single round.
08d704d5-3e6d-4e3f-88fb-2af775e89a2c:

In addition, the edges of the pit are sloped, and any creature ending its turn on a square adjacent to the pit must make a Reflex saving throw with a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to avoid falling into it. When the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} ends, creatures within the hole rise up with the bottom of the pit until they are standing on the surface over the course of a single round.

d4867d72-e619-424e-9bb1-6d02d2a98995: You create an onrushing surge of water 10 feet high in either a 30-foot cone or a 60-foot line that deals 1d10 points of bludgeoning damage for every 2 caster levels you have (maximum 10d10 at 20th level). In addition to taking damage, creatures that fail their Reflex saves are pushed 1d4Ã—5 feet away from you and are knocked prone. Magical effects with fire descriptor on targets in the area of a tidal surge and similar area effects in the selected point are affected as if you had cast dispel magic.
48e61fa4-8f3b-4483-9feb-5ef4761f4d17:
You create two Colossal-sized masses of rock, dirt, and stone and slam them together against a single creature between them. The clashing rocks appear up to 30 feet away from the target on opposite sides and rush toward it with a mighty grinding crash. You must make a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit the target with the rocks. The clashing rocks ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}. A creature struck by the clashing rocks takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}20d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} and is knocked prone.
If the clashing rocks miss the target, the target still takes 10d6 points of bludgeoning {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from falling rocks and is knocked prone. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} reduces this damage to half and the target remains standing. Creatures other than the target that occupy the spaces where the clashing rocks appear or within their path must also make Reflex saves or take 10d6 points of bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone (save for half and remain standing).
314e535e-523a-4ebe-83f1-7fff35a0ba83: You detoxify any sort of venom in the creature or object touched. If the target is a creature, you must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d20{/g} + caster level) against the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of each poison affecting the target. Success means that the poison is neutralized.[LONGSTART] A cured creature suffers no additional effects from the poison, and any temporary effects are ended, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} does not reverse instantaneous effects, such as hit point {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, temporary {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}, or effects that don't go away on their own.[LONGEND]
b453b512-2b56-4e15-8ae0-53df07a87235: You direct a ray of positive energy. You must make a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit, and if the ray hits an undead creature, it deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to it.
d990e9ec-012c-441d-bd1d-fadbdcd90af7:
You draw down holy power to smite your enemies. Only evil and neutral creatures are harmed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}; good creatures are unaffected.
The spell deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two caster levels (maximum 5d8) to each evil creature in the area (or 1d6 points of damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, maximum 10d6, to an evil outsider) and causes it to become blinded for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} reduces damage to half and negates the blinded effect.
The spell deals only half damage to creatures who are neither good nor evil, and they are not blinded. Such a creature can reduce that damage by half (down to one-quarter of the roll) with a successful Will save.
c688030f-ccba-47b2-a8b5-d204790590fb: You emanate waves of intense pleasure that cause all targets within range to falter. Affected creatures are stunned for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} and are staggered for the remainder of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. A creature that makes its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}will save{/g} is staggered for the first round and can act normally thereafter.
1c224fb0-7f5e-4634-b6c4-8ad336e2ee0a: You emit an ear-splitting yell that stuns and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damages{/g} creatures in its path. Any creature within the area is stunned for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} and takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} negates the stun and reduces the damage by half.
a2d79f43-2a70-4163-b54e-2085ff2c3837:
You expel a cone-shaped burst of toxic mist from your mouth, subjecting everyone caught in the area to a deadly poison, as per the poison {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
Poison: Calling upon the venomous powers of natural predators, you infect the subject with a horrible poison by making a successful melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This poison deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for 6 rounds. Poisoned creatures can make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} each round to negate the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and end the affliction.
26aa562c-cbd7-4bc9-9e4d-27d383d6195e: You fade into the background, and while you are not truly invisible, you are hard to pinpoint due to your translucent state. While under the effects of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g} and have {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} from creatures more than 5 feet away ({g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} have a 20% miss chance).
26ff1ac2-9cca-4beb-8f9b-beaaac959d99: You fill an enemy's head with waking dreams, a reminder of the pleasures, delights, and terrors to be found in the dream world. While in this strange dream state, the target moves at half its normal {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. Multiple haze of dreams effects do not stack, nor does this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s effect stack with slow.
bfd143c1-ed73-4418-a384-0ed363147d4d: You fill the targets' minds with feelings of tranquility. Those attempting to commit violence become stricken with wracking pain and take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} they attempt to harm another creature.
c41bb561-bfad-406a-92b3-fb535403a368: You fill your target's mind with a blaring cacophony of discordant sounds, making it hard for the target to act and {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentrate{/g}. The creature gains the nauseated condition for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} if it fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}.
75086de4-af6b-4be0-a51d-f3e182e4e407: You fire a shimmering arrow of pure order from your holy symbol at any one target in range as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. A chaotic creature struck by an arrow of law takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two caster levels (maximum 5d8). A chaotic outsider instead takes 1d6 points of damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 10d6) and is dazed for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} reduces the damage to half and negates the daze effect. This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals only half damage to creatures that are neither chaotic nor lawful, and they are not dazed. The arrow has no effect on lawful creatures.
1c2cbe99-2383-4c9d-8a63-625e3d476782: You fire a small orb of acid at the target. You must succeed on a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit your target. The orb deals 1â€“3 ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g}) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g}.
e04e649b-62cf-41a7-a980-4f8e8dae179d: You force an evil creature that does not have the evil subtype to momentarily reflect on its past {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g} and be overcome by grief and conscience. The target immediately drops prone and begins to loudly confess all of its sins and transgressions to the caster for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. The spell immediately ends if the target is {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacked{/g}.
52b952b1-2cc5-4e61-9b4b-c8243bb21aee: You gain a +2 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g}, and a +1 competence bonus on Fortitude {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}.
3f3707f8-8f8d-43ab-9ee8-734bc52f976c:
You gain a +2 dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}, your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} increases by 20 feet, you can move through any undergrowth (including magically manipulated undergrowth) at your normal speed, and can even make a 5-foot step within such terrain.[LONGSTART]
Furthermore, when you are hit with an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} of opportunity, you can make a single attack with your antlers against the opponent that hit you as an immediate {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}. This attack uses your highest {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} plus your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus (your choice) and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} (if you are Medium; 1d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} if Small) plus your Strength modifier on a successful hit. The antlers have a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier of 19â€“20/Ã—2.[LONGEND]
fb864d76-1665-4cdd-bfae-525d28afff69: You gain a +4 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility checks{/g}.
9d0a04b2-da8f-40f6-90a3-2e756b08db44: You gain a powerful aura, similar to an archon's aura of menace. Any hostile creature within a 20-foot radius of you must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to resist the effects of this aura. If the creature fails, it takes a â€“2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and saving throws and to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} for the duration of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, or until it successfully hits you with an attack. A creature that has resisted or broken the effect cannot be affected again by this particular casting of archon's aura.
8e311b01-6eff-4788-8525-2de845ccd274: You gain intuitive insight into the workings of traps. You gain an insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +10) on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} made to find traps while the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is in effect.
b764bcbb-e17b-422a-80db-6118b995ee89:
You gain some of the beneficial qualities of an animal. Your base form is largely unchanged and your {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} is unaltered, but some of your body parts are altered. Armor or gear you are wearing adjusts to your new shape for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. When you cast animal aspect, choose one of the following animals to gain the associated benefits. You can only have one animal aspect or greater animal aspect spell active on you at a time.
Gorilla: Your arms become long, flexible, and strong like those of a great ape. You gain a +4 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g}.
Monkey: Your hands and arms become dexterous like those of a simian. You gain a +4 competence bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics checks{/g}, and you can throw objects as if you had the Throw Anything {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
Raccoon: Your hands become extremely dexterous, and your feet become padded. You gain a +2 competence bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g}.
Raptor: Your legs become built for running {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}, like those of a deinonychus. You gain a enhancement bonus of +20 feet to your base speed.
b23c4a8a-50a8-4500-af53-2221c4ceab5e: You gain temporary, intuitive insight into the immediate future during your next {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. Your next single attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} (if it is made before the end of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}) gains a +20 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Additionally, you are not affected by the miss chance that applies to attackers trying to strike a {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealed{/g} target.
90519a83-c47f-4228-a8be-da0843d65714:
You give the subject a single command, which it obeys to the best of its ability at its earliest opportunity. You may select from the following options.
Approach: On its turn, the subject moves toward you as quickly and directly as possible for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. The creature may do nothing but move during its turn, and it provokes {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} for this movement as normal.
Fall: On its turn, the subject falls to the ground and remains prone for 1 round. It may act normally while prone but takes any appropriate {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}.
Flee: On its turn, the subject moves away from you as quickly as possible for 1 round. It may do nothing but move during its turn, and it provokes {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} of opportunity for this movement as normal.
Halt: The subject stands in place for 1 round. It may not take any {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g} but is not considered {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g}.
If the subject can't carry out your command on its next turn, the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} automatically fails.
b00dbd86-2600-494a-9c8f-f4353d1b03ea: You had a very tender sleep. For the next 24 hours you gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving throws{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} against your {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with sleep descriptor is increased by 3.
f7cb2cbc-b34a-4703-96e0-d11a4dfa8196: You harness the power of unlife to grant yourself a limited ability to avoid {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}. While this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is in effect, you gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} + 1 per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +10).
9d76be67-0d2a-4490-836f-f11fa957ce7f: You have witnessed a creature being resurrected from the dead and now have a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
6209ca2f-0513-4baa-8fc9-8642c6d0665d:
You hurl a fist-sized ball of force resembling a sphere of spikes to ram a designated creature. You must succeed on a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to strike your target. On a successful hit, you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of force {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two caster levels (maximum 5d6). For every 5 caster levels you possess beyond 5th, you gain an additional ball of force.
A creature struck by any of these is subject to a bull rush attempt. The force has a {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier (whichever is highest). The {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} for the force's bull rush uses your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} as its {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}, adding the force's Strength modifier and a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional blast that hits. If the bull rush succeeds, the force pushes the creature away from you in a straight line, and the creature must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or fall prone.
4982e685-21b4-4913-bf91-0ddddcd408ac: You imbue a shield with an enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of +1 per four {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum +5 at 20th level).
ba206eb2-5688-492b-ba90-7a379a4ba1d8:
You imbue a suit of armor or a shield with an enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of +1 per four {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum +5 at 20th level).[LONGSTART]
An outfit of regular clothing counts as armor that grants no {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} bonus for the purpose of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.[LONGEND]
dc7b907f-3ef6-4481-98d5-9f8501a12219:
You imbue a suit of armor with an enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of +1 per four {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum +5 at 20th level).[LONGSTART]
An outfit of regular clothing counts as armor that grants no {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} bonus for the purpose of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.[LONGEND]
b5e7ea3a-da12-410d-a1e0-a15d8a7b2079: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}.
a627e11d-8965-4ba4-bbeb-bacd8c400e75: You imbue the target with an exaggerated sense of its own mortality and a drive for self-preservation. The target is shaken, and the first time each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} the target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (including the first round of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s duration), it must succeed at another {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} or its fear level increases by one step (from shaken to frightened). If the target fails a saving throw against this effect while frightened, it is transfixed in terror and is {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g} for the remainder of the spell's duration. If the target succeeds at the initial Will save, it is shaken for 1 round but its fear level cannot be further increased by this spell's effects during that round.
3c61840c-ca12-4cf7-b4f8-7308abb8d64e:
You implant within the minds of your targets the illusion that their skin is rotting away, large rents are appearing all over their bodies, and their internal organs are spilling out into a putrid half-liquid mass at their feet. Those who fail to disbelieve phantasmal putrefaction immediately take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. This damage occurs only once.
Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} after that, an affected target receives another {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to disbelieve the effect, and targets that fail must succeed at a Fortitude save or faint, falling asleep as per sleep (except that it isn't a magical sleep effect). Waking up doesn't end the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} for a target; it must continue to attempt Will saves to disbelieve and Fortitude saves to avoid fainting each round until the spell ends or the target successfully disbelieves.
c1aaf1b6-65c2-4049-9ec4-5814b7d5c29d: You implant within the minds of your targets the illusion that they are engulfed in tangled webs teeming with swarms of tiny spiders. Those who fail to disbelieve the phantasmal web are treated as if in a web {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, but must also make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} after that or become nauseated for that round by the phantasmal spiders. Freedom of movement allows unobstructed movement but does not negate nausea effects.
d7486745-d397-42cd-9533-bfe610f0c772: You inflict a painful, itching rash on the target creature. The target is sickened and takes a â€“4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} (this penalty cannot lower Dexterity below 0).
68b7bd11-5337-4e26-becb-fe1add966db6: You instantly transfer yourself from your current location to any other spot within range. You may also bring with you all friendly creatures within a 10-foot radius around you.
7dd7378d-68ac-4bd1-8287-f15d2c51fe3c: You instill courage in the subject, granting it a +4 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} against fear effects for 10 minutes.[LONGSTART] If the subject is under the influence of a fear effect when receiving the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, that effect is suppressed for the duration of the spell.[LONGEND]
60ad6c70-59da-4240-b415-e2b2684739d5: You mark several allies with a flaming rune. This rune does not cause {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, and sheds light as if it were a torch. While the firebrand burns, any creature it marks is immune to damage from any fire {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} you cast. All of the target's weapons (both natural and manufactured) inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}+1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} on a hit (this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} fire damage stacks with any amount of fire damage a creature's weapons might already inflict). At any point during the spell's duration, a creature bearing a firebrand can launch a beam of fire at any target within 30 feet as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. This ray requires a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit and deals 6d6 points of fire damage. Once a creature uses its firebrand to fire a ray in this manner, the effects of the spell end for that creature.
6bbe4c51-eebc-4acc-a99b-ea29b7b9e507: You may call down a 6-foot-wide, 30-foot-long, vertical bolt of lightning that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. The bolt of lightning flashes down in a vertical stroke at whatever target point you choose within medium range.
7c51eba9-c911-4f32-bf06-404b3bd3a347: You may call down a vertical bolt of lightning that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. The bolt of lightning flashes down in a vertical stroke at whatever target point you choose within long range.
939a1b14-1556-4537-a97c-e1cd95ffc188: You mimic tugging at the Green Mother's legendary Tangled Knot to subtly alter your fate. The next single attack made against you takes a -10 penalty. If that attack is a critical hit, it is instead treated as a normal hit.
79060d46-44c9-4ba0-bbf1-dce257d71edc:
You must have a melee weapon in hand to cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, your weapon resounds. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of sonic {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. Your weapon is not harmed by this {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}.
If you are using your judgment ability or smite ability against the target, it is staggered for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} on a successful attack. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} negates the staggering effect.
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, the target is stunned for 1 round and blinded for 1d6 rounds. A successful Fortitude save negates the stunning and blindness effects. If you are also using judgment or smite, your foe makes only a single save against all effects.
This spell immediately ends if your weapon leaves your hand.
Resounding blow stacks with the thundering weapon property.
982882d1-c181-4f9c-8067-d4fc3c4ebd03: You must succeed on a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. Your touch deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum 10d6). You gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to the damage you deal. The temporary hit points disappear 1 hour later.
b3a7d9e7-8197-4889-9cad-7782274a3c1a: You open a link between your mind and the subject's mind, giving advice and encouragement for as long as the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is in effect. Each time the subject of the spell makes an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability check{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g}, it {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} two d20s and takes the better result. If any roll is a natural 20, the spell's effect ends â€” your brilliant advice is spent.
8cb73393-d513-4c45-9cc4-3781a495c763:
You place a curse on the subject. Choose one of the following:
Curse of Feeble Body â€” The subject suffers a â€“6 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score.
Curse of Weakness â€” The subject suffers a â€“6 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} scores.
Curse of Idiocy â€” The subject suffers a â€“6 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} scores.
Curse of Deterioration â€” The subject suffers a â€“4 penalty on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
c95a742a-1aac-44a3-a415-a59874b268f9:
You place a curse on the subject. Choose one of the following:
Greater Curse of Feeble Body â€” The subject suffers a -12 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score.
Greater Curse of Weakness â€” The subject suffers a -12 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} scores.
Greater Curse of Idiocy â€” The subject suffers a -12 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} scores.
Greater Curse of Deterioration â€” The subject suffers a -8 penalty on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
45ae6898-08f3-4c5a-a63e-bc99bcfa9313:
You plunge an area into the brutal chill of the arctic night.
All creatures in the area take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} and 1d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} each round negates the {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}Dexterity damage{/g} but not the cold damage.
c02c66ee-41c1-41cd-8a67-470650840ba7:
You point your finger and fire a black ray of negative energy that suppresses the life force of any living creature it strikes. You must make a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit. If you hit, the subject gains {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d4{/g} temporary negative levels. Negative levels stack.[LONGSTART]
Twenty-four hours after gaining them, the subject must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = energy drain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s save DC) for each negative level. If the save succeeds, that negative level is removed. If it fails, that negative level becomes permanent.
An undead creature struck by the ray gains 2d4 Ã— 5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} for 1 hour.[LONGEND]
627763da-da5a-4235-bec4-7914f386e0e2:
You point your finger and fire a black ray of negative energy that suppresses the life force of any living creature it strikes.[LONGSTART] You must make a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit.[LONGEND] If you hit, the subject gains {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} temporary negative levels.[LONGSTART]
Negative levels stack. Assuming the subject survives, it regains lost levels after a number of hours equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 15 hours). Usually, negative levels have a chance of becoming permanent, but the negative levels from enervation don't last long enough to do so.
An undead creature struck by the ray gains 1d4 x 5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} for 1 hour.[LONGEND]
f51110df-10db-48c2-9171-4cad892b4185:
You quell feelings of illness and nausea in the target, giving it a +4 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against disease, nausea, and sickened effects.
If the subject is already under the influence of one of these effects when receiving the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, that effect is suppressed for the duration of the spell.
4e071907-0719-4802-9a0f-31465cfc1f60: You quell feelings of illness and nausea in the target, giving it a +4 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against disease, nausea, and sickened effects. If the subject is already under the influence of one of these effects when receiving the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, that effect is suppressed for the duration of the spell.
8ca9d9e0-1e62-4988-86a7-cc757f725af9: You receive immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} as well as to any negative effects from Forge.
45c5cee4-7955-4f78-a73e-9eb26964879c: You release a powerful stroke of electrical energy that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 10d6) to each creature within its area. The bolt begins at your fingertips.
3355d508-0ecc-41aa-b5c0-b69c10b69fc9:
You restore life to a deceased party member. A raised creature has a number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to its current HD. Raise dead also removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}'s door condition.
Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The subject of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} gains two permanent negative levels when it is raised, just as if it had been hit by an energy-draining creature, though it can not gain a number of negative levels equal to or greater than its total {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} this way.
A creature whose permanent negative levels already equal its Hit Dice cannot be brought back to life through raise dead.
2ae836af-b301-4cd7-8976-2fd1d4da0b5f: You sheathe yourself within a churning column of pure elemental water up to 30 feet high that fills your space. You can see, hear, and breathe normally within the seamantle, but {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against you are treated as if you were under the surface of the water. You gain improved cover (+8 cover {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, +4 bonus on Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}) against foes that do not have freedom of movement effects. You also gain immunity to fire. The cover granted by the seamantle does not enable you to make {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g} or prevent {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Magical attacks against you are unaffected unless they require attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
153de913-80af-4b84-a3b7-076ac27ca8db:
You speak a terrible word of power, setting up potentially lethal vibrations in the chosen target. The target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} once each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, and the effects grow stronger for each saving throw the creature fails.
On the first round, the target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} and is staggered for 1 round. A successful save halves the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and negates the staggered effect.
On the second round, the target takes 5d6 points of damage and is stunned for 1 round. A successful save halves the damage and negates the stunning effect.
On the third round, the target takes 10d6 points of damage and is stunned for 1d4+1 rounds. A successful save halves the damage and negates the stunning effect.
The resonating word has no power after the third round, even if the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s duration is increased.
62abb4fc-193c-403f-a97c-f27c30343f0e: You spit a stream of venom at a target using a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. If the venom hits, it causes blindness for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. The target must also {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} or be poisoned by black adder venom; the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} in successive rounds of the poison is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s DC.
6c0ea0f1-0e68-4e5e-8926-81eb959b286e: You summon a wasp swarm, which does not {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} you. The dense cloud of vermin gives you partial {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g}. Any creature that makes a successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} against you takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and poison from the wasp swarm, but is not affected by the swarm's distraction ability.
02c148dc-edf4-4088-a93e-aeebb63974e7: You surround the touched creatures with a constant and moveable 1 inch thick shell of tolerable living conditions. This shell enables the subjects to breathe freely, even underwater or in a vacuum, as well as making them immune to harmful gases and vapors, including inhaled diseases and poisons and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} like cloudkill and stinking cloud.
280abe4e-9a53-43fd-90d5-344a4bd95175:
You surround yourself with a buffeting shroud of supernatural, tornado-force winds. These winds grant you a fly {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} of 60 feet with perfect {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuverability{/g}. Neither your armor nor your load affects this fly speed. The winds shield you from any other wind effects, and form a shell of breathable air around you, allowing you to fly and breathe underwater or in outer space.
You have total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g}. Gases and most gaseous breath weapons cannot pass though the winds.
In addition, when a creature hits you with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, you can shape your winds so they lash out at that creature as an immediate {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}. The creature must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude Saving Throw{/g} or take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} and be knocked prone (if on the ground). On a failed save, Huge flying creatures are {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checked{/g} and Large-sized or smaller flying creatures are blown away instead of knocked prone.
On a successful save, the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is halved and the creature is not knocked prone (or checked or blown away).
cd7cbee9-c66a-44e6-9485-380b7fc7b2f8: You take control of a target living creature's skeleton. A creature has its skeleton rattle within its flesh, causing it grievous harm. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, plus 1d6 additional points of damage per 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
3886baf3-2a5d-4ebf-8162-1e8e5dc382a9: You take on an aspect of a bear. You gain a +2 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +2 enhancement bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}. You also gain the ability to perform a bull rush {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}.
b1f3b3b8-3d15-410d-aa3d-eb13235fda44:
You take on an aspect of a falcon. Your eyes become wide and raptor-like, and you grow feathers on the sides of your head. You gain a +3 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g}, a +1 competence bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier for your bows and crossbows becomes 19â€“20/Ã—3.
This effect does not stack with any other effect that expands the threat range of a weapon, such as the Improved Critical {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} or a keen weapon.
7264687e-5999-455d-a44c-3b5786e7531a: You take on an aspect of an angelic being, including some of its physical characteristics. You gain resistance to acid and cold 10, and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/evil. You also gain a +2 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +2 resistance bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made or effects created by evil creatures. In addition, your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} and any weapons you wield are considered {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction.
db1ff7dd-5fbc-4068-b40d-55027d0448cd: You tap energy from the Plane of Shadow to cast a quasi-real, illusory version of a fireball, lightning bolt, shout, volcanic storm, or ice storm {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. Spells that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} have normal effects unless an affected creature succeeds at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}. Each disbelieving creature takes only one-fifth damage from the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. Regardless of the result of the save to disbelieve, an affected creature is also allowed any save (or {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}) that the spell being simulated allows, but the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is set according to shadow evocation's level (5th) rather than the spell's normal level.
ac119c47-0366-40a8-b2ff-dd682b430bee:
You transform the target's face into a hideous shape, such as a half-melted visage with insect legs instead of teeth, seeping pits instead of eyes, and suckered tongues dangling from its misshapen mouth. You do not choose what shape the target's face takes, and the shape is different every time you cast the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. This transformation does not interfere with the target's senses or its ability to breathe, though it might prevent it from speaking. The target gains a +4 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.
If the target does not normally have a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, it gains a bite attack as a {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapon{/g} for the duration of the spell. This bite attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} if the target is Medium, 1d4 points of damage if the target is Small, or 1d8 points of damage if the creature is Large. The target may use this bite as a primary attack or a secondary attack.
d108b0c4-9f69-4620-ac6f-c35c6e8d5ce6: You trap the target in solid ice. If the creature fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g}, it is paralyzed, if the target makes its save, it gains the entangled condition but can otherwise act normally. Whether or not the target saves, it takes 1 point of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} it is paralyzed or entangled in the ice. A creature can break the ice with a successful Fortitude saving throw against your normal spell DC each round after receiving the effect.
3b7749d2-a5c7-4b01-9be6-a2affdb1327d: You unleash a powerful scream, inaudible to all but a single target. The target is dazed for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} and takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of sonic {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum 5d6). A successful Fortitude {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} negates the daze effect and halves the damage.
db959b2d-bc37-4ba1-8b70-2819607eeb18:
You unleash chaotic power to smite your enemies. The power takes the form of a multicolored explosion of leaping, ricocheting energy. Only lawful and neutral (not chaotic) creatures are harmed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
The spell deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two caster levels (maximum 5d8) to lawful creatures (or 1d6 points of damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, maximum 10d6, to lawful outsiders) and slows them for 1d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} (see the slow spell). A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} reduces the damage by half and negates the slow effect.
The spell deals only half damage against creatures who are neither lawful nor chaotic, and they are not slowed. Such a creature can reduce the damage by half again (down to one-quarter) with a successful Will save.
98584a2f-8a5f-4fef-b452-b278efe4ac53: You unleash your divine powers against a single target. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} halves the damage.
eb64cc49-35fb-41bf-bae0-a5708bd3b288:
You use material from the Plane of Shadow to shape quasi-real illusions of one or more creatures, objects, or forces. Shadow conjuration can mimic any sorcerer or wizard conjuration (summoning) or conjuration (creation) {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} of 3rd level or lower. Shadow conjurations are only one-fifth (20%) as strong as the real things, though creatures who believe the shadow conjurations to be real are affected by them at full strength. Any creature that interacts with the spell can make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to recognize its true nature.
Spells that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} have normal effects unless the affected creature succeeds on a Will save. Each disbelieving creature takes only one-fifth (20%) damage from the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. If the disbelieved attack has a special effect other than damage, that effect is only 20% likely to occur. Regardless of the result of the save to disbelieve, an affected creature is also allowed any save that the spell being simulated allows, but the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is set according to shadow conjuration's level (4th) rather than the spell's normal level. In addition, any effect created by shadow conjuration allows {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, even if the spell it is simulating does not. Shadow objects or substances have normal effects except against those who disbelieve them. Against disbelievers, they are 20% likely to work.
A shadow creature has one-fifth the {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} of a normal creature of its kind (regardless of whether it's recognized as shadowy). It deals normal damage and has all normal abilities and weaknesses. Against a creature that recognizes it as a shadow creature, however, the shadow creature's damage is one-fifth (20%) normal, and all {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special abilities{/g} that do not deal lethal damage are only 20% likely to work. ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}Roll{/g} for each use and each affected character separately.) Furthermore, the shadow creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are just one-fifth as large. A creature that succeeds on its save sees the shadow conjurations as transparent images superimposed on vague, shadowy forms. Objects automatically succeed on their Will saves against this spell.
b0ab0473-c2d8-46bc-97e6-f1003a752bb9: You utter a single word of power that causes a creature to become blinded, whether the creature can hear the word or not. The duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} depends on the target's current hit point total. Any creature that currently has 201 or more {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} is unaffected. For 50 or less HP, the effect is permanent; for 51â€“100 HP, the duration is {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 minutes; for 101â€“200 HP, the duration is 1d4+1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
1a0e3a71-c9cf-4788-9707-96bea8745251: You utter a single word of power that instantly causes one creature of your choice to become stunned, whether the creature can hear the word or not. The duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} depends on the target's current hit point total. Any creature that currently has 151 or more {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} is unaffected by power word stun. For 50 or less HP, the duration is {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}; for 51â€“100 HP, the duration is 2d4 rounds; for 101â€“150 HP, the duration is 1d4 rounds.
0b97c744-5ecc-4fe7-a2f8-3d42c0677fb1: You utter a single word of power that instantly kills one creature of your choice, whether the creature can hear the word or not. Any creature that currently has 101 or more {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} is unaffected by power word kill.
e0ff4a37-f03f-4aa1-aa1c-cc232616346c: You weaken the target's defenses against poison. The target gains a â€“4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against poison. Attempts to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} the poisoned target take a â€“4 penalty.
df03ef94-ca45-4a20-96dd-d23c1c3ad770: You weaken the target's defenses against poison. The target gains a â€“4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against poison. Attempts to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} the poisoned target with {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} or magic take a â€“4 penalty.
46506c39-8f3c-489c-bb8c-6ae3a3c92d22: You whisper a single word in the primordial language of good that is anathema to the minions of evil and strengthens the resolve of good creatures. Evil creatures within the burst must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or become sickened for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}/level. Evil outsiders with the evil subtype, {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil-aligned{/g} dragons, and undead in the burst also take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} if they fail their saves. Good-aligned creatures in the burst gain a +2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and damage rolls for 1 round.
dca2571d-8cd4-4eee-ae93-b6e0aacb87f8: You wrack the target's body and mind with the anguish and suffering of every bitter failure it will ever {g|Encyclopedia:XP}experience{/g}, rendering it permanently shaken and sickened. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} reduces the duration to 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per level.
ab62f7ff-a7b8-474c-80ba-f62e808145ae: You {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g} an object when you cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, causing the object to shed bright light in a 60-foot radius. This illumination increases the light level for an additional 60 feet by one step (darkness becomes dim light, dim light becomes normal light, and normal light becomes bright light).[LONGSTART] Creatures that take {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} in bright light take them while within the 60-foot radius of this magical light. Despite its name, this spell is not the equivalent of daylight for the purposes of creatures that are {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damaged{/g} or destroyed by such light.[LONGEND]
b83d61d7-87bf-41ca-b696-9eefd9f0e3ad: Your animal companion's bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} deals an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g}, and the acid deals another 1d4 points of acid {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to the target on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.[LONGSTART] The acid continues to deal damage for 1 additional round per 4 caster levels (to a maximum of 6 total rounds at {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} 20th). This ongoing acid damage doesn't stack from multiple attacks, but the duration resets if a newer bite would cause the ongoing damage to last longer than the duration remaining from a previous one. The acid does not harm the animal companion.[LONGEND]
b7c6ba3f-2e4f-419f-b8d4-252223ecf07a: Your arms become long, flexible, and strong like those of a great ape. You gain a +4 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g}.
89e0bb97-03bb-4194-adbe-8bd09f761cce:
Your body is a living flame. You and your equipment are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}. In fact, every time you would normally take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from fire, you are instead {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} of damage at a rate of 1 point per 3 points of damage the fire {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} would have normally inflicted. You are immune to blindness, {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} damage, disease, electricity, poison, and stunning. You have acid resistance 30. You take 150% as much damage from cold as normal.
You have a +6 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} score. Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attack{/g} deals an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of fire damage, and you are considered armed when making unarmed attacks. Fire {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast have their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} DCs increased by +1.
f63433df-ddf3-4981-8a42-371b52a19d89: Your breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}12d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} in a 100-foot line and allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You can use it as often as you like, but you must wait 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} between uses.

You can use it as often as you like, but you must wait 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} between uses.

You can use it as often as you like, but you must wait 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} between uses.
273b0a1e-f3de-469e-96bc-b74d2f7ff87e: Your breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}12d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} in a 100-foot line and allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You can use it as often as you like, but you must wait 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} between uses.
ba5fbb49-760c-4c96-887e-440c318e4fb4: Your breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}12d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} in a 50-foot cone and allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You can use it as often as you like, but you must wait 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} between uses.
b9d3b0a3-5a70-4b0d-85dc-f7a04651b67f: Your breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}6d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} in a 30-foot cone and allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.

02d9d8f4-7cf2-4e2c-8276-bb8d2430b9a1:
Your form transmutes into living ice, granting you several abilities. You gain immunity to cold, vulnerability to fire and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} 5/magic. You are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability score damage{/g}, blindness, {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}, disease, drowning, electricity, poison, stunning, and all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} that affect your physiology or respiration, because you have no physiology or respiration while this spell is in effect. You cannot drink (and thus can't use potions).
Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to a club sized for you ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} for Small characters or 1d6 for Medium characters) plus 1 point of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g}, and you are considered armed when making unarmed attacks.
e0b70443-90cc-4710-a3fa-687c230a4558: Your gestures and droning incantation fascinate nearby living creatures, causing them to stop and stare blankly at you in a dazed condition. {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}Roll{/g} 2d4 to see how many total HD of creatures you affect.
dfc32ed5-12db-4846-9b02-c1d01f3074d9: Your hands become extremely dexterous, and your feet become padded. You gain a +2 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g}.
ac1a9f58-5edc-4bd9-8f29-51858d369387:
Your height immediately doubles, and your weight increases by a factor of eight. This increase changes your {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} category to the next larger one. You gain a +4 size {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} and take a â€“2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}. You gain a +2 form bonus to your natural armor. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/evil (if you are good or neutral) or DR 5/good (if you are evil). At 15th level, this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction becomes 10/evil or 10/good (the maximum).
Your size modifier for {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} changes as appropriate to your new size category. This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} doesn't change your {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. Determine space and {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} as appropriate to your new size. All equipment you wear or carry is similarly enlarged by the spell. Weapons deal more damage.
Magical effects that increase size do not stack.
09e9b19a-f7e1-4aa9-9be7-6b7e798d1f65: Your inspired words overwhelm others with transcendental bliss. All allies within the area of effect are freed from any emotion effects. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} also cures {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to all allies in the area.
872751ea-3d6c-4fdc-ad07-6d1bf4795beb: Your legs become built for running {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}, like those of a deinonychus. You gain a enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of +20 feet to your base speed.
21cb0c60-c383-434f-85ba-4fe860a026e0: Your litany conjures chains of energy that lash upward from the ground and hamper the target's movement. The target is entangled.
5992ed29-7422-4cea-b65f-aeac5fcca9d0: Your litany is a fascinating diatribe of grace, causing your target to do nothing but listen. The target is fascinated. Any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to the target automatically breaks the effect.
494b93e5-ee67-48d7-ac02-c3ce1e99d4dc: Your main-hand melee weapon is deadly to undead. Any undead creature with HD equal to or less than your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} or be destroyed utterly if struck in combat with this weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}Spell resistance{/g} does not apply against the destruction effect.
f44736db-6210-42dd-99ed-420956d75dd9: Your melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} and causes the target to be staggered for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} is a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, the target is staggered for 1 minute instead.
f5ef4d9a-e0b5-437e-92e1-5efd59c6d866: Your presence inspires incredible awe in those nearby. A creature that fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} against this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} falls to the ground and prostrates itself before you, believing it bows before a divine presence. These creatures are cowering for the duration of the spell. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} after that, a target of this spell may attempt a new saving throw to end the effect. A creature that recovers from this spell early after being affected by it takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} drain and is staggered for 1d4 rounds. A creature that succeeds at the initial save to {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}resist this spell{/g} is merely staggered for 1 round.

a15fe870-0ca5-478c-a302-910c82af8429: [LONGSTART]Hurricane bow significantly increases the weight and density of arrows or bolts fired from your bow or crossbow the instant before they strike their target and then return them to normal a few moments later. [LONGEND]Any arrow fired from a bow or crossbow you are carrying when the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is cast deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} as if one {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} larger than it actually is. For instance, an arrow fired from a Medium longbow normally deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of damage, but it would instead deal 2d6 points of damage if fired from a hurricane bow.
7bbbf6f1-3c12-4f1c-b55a-a7938b8f520a: [LONGSTART]Lead blades increases the momentum and density of your melee weapons just as they strike a foe. [LONGEND]All melee weapons you are carrying when the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is cast deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} as if one {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} category larger than they actually are. For instance, a Medium longsword normally deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of damage, but it would instead deal 2d6 points of damage if benefiting from lead blades.[LONGSTART] Only you can benefit from this spell. If anyone else uses one of your weapons to make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, it deals damage as normal for its size.[LONGEND]

7c5e4deb-9170-4671-9a0b-2a198bcf7cb9: {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}Piercing{/g} spires of rock erupt up from the ground, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d8{/g} points of piercing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and knocking the creature prone (a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} halves this damage and avoids being knocked prone). Once the stalagmites appear, they function thereafter as spike stones for 1 minute per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and then crumble to dust.
482fff6e-067f-47d6-b251-fcd1c9fed9a7:
{g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Heal{/g} enables you to channel positive energy into a creature to wipe away {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}injury{/g} and afflictions. It immediately ends any and all of the following adverse conditions affecting the target: {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}, blinded, confused, dazed, dazzled, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, nauseated, poisoned, sickened, and stunned. It also cures 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per level of the caster, to a maximum of 150 points at 15th level.
Heal does not remove negative levels or restore permanently drained {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} points.
If used against an undead creature, heal instead acts like harm.
